purpose: The drill is essential for efficiently assembling furniture. It enables fast, secure screw driving and pilot hole drilling, making the assembly service possible.

capabilities.description: Enables quick and secure attachment of furniture pieces
Prevents wood splitting and ensures proper alignment

conditions: Service location has power or battery backup

examples.scenario: Assembled IKEA desk using drill for all screws
examples.outcome: Completed assembly in 45 minutes vs 2+ hours manually

notes: This is a critical relationship - without the drill, assembly service would be much slower and less efficient.
